shorts.description: OFFENSIVE PLAYER OF THE WEEK WILL McPARTLAND, Scranton Prep The senior completed 11 of 13 passes for 204 yards and a touchdown, and ran for 20 yards and two touchdowns to lead the Cavaliers into the District 2 Class 3A final with a 42-0 win over No. 2 seed Wyoming Area. DEFENSIVE PLAYER OF THE WEEK JACKSON HARDING, Dunmore The junior had five tackles, forced a fumble and returned it for a touchdown that pushed Dunmore’s lead to 20-0 in the third quarter of its 27-7 win over Riverside in the District 2 Class 2A semifinals. shorts.title: Lackawanna County public library feeds those in need
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County public library feeds those in need.
shorts.description: PECKVILLE, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Public libraries are places for learning, reading, and building community, but it's also a supplemental food resource for many people. One local library works with non-profit organizations to fill in the gaps so no one goes hungry. Valley Community Library in Peckville is more than a place to check out [...]
